summary: 7 Noiral companions  4 girls 3 boys waiting to kick some.....
descriptionHtml:
[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34722-1-1365865692.jpg[/img]
[center]This is 7 Noiral followers for your adventures. 
This esp adds 7 hair styles and 1 female hair color to the Noiral sliders. If you are using Apachii\'s hair mods there will be duplicates for the Noiral race. They will have no negative affects as they have been renamed. No other races are affected!
You can use any of the Norial body types.
[b][color=red][u]There is now a 2nd file with no duplicate hairs[/u][/color][/b]


[font=\"impact\"][color=red]Where they can be found:[/color][/font]

[color=green][u]Temple of Mara at Riften:[/u][/color]

[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34722-3-1365824825.jpg[/img]
Keylli
Combat Assassin, Lvl 7-100

[color=green][u]Dead Man\'s Drink at Falkreath:[/u][/color]

[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34722-1-1365824853.jpg[/img]
Wiljean
Combat Barbarian, Lvl 5-90

[color=green][u]Drunken Huntsman at Whiterun:[/u][/color]

[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34722-1-1365824825.jpg[/img]
Gunnar
Combat Warrior 2H, Lvl 5-95

[color=green][u]The Fozen Hearth Inn at Winterhold:[/u][/color]

[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34722-4-1365824825.jpg[/img]
Kiko
Combat Sorcerer, Lvl 4-85
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34722-5-1365824825.jpg[/img]
Suvachia
Combat Mage Elemental, Lvl 5-90

[color=green][u]The Silver-Blood Inn at Markarth:[/u][/color]

[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34722-2-1365824825.jpg[/img]
Haillee
Combat Scout, Lvl 6-99
[img=center]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34722-2-1365824853.jpg[/img]
Alyka
Combat Nightingale, Lvl 5-85

[font=\"impact\"][color=red]Required:[/color][/font]
Wyldsong\'s[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24397] Noiral Race[/url]
TMPhoenix\'s[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24168] Race Compatibility[/url]

[b](The next files do not need to be active. You can delete the esm if not in use.)[/b]
Apachii\'s[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168] SkyHair v1.5, SkyFemale v1.3, & Male v1.1[/url]

[font=\"impact\"][color=red]Installation:[/color][/font]
Should work with any installer.

[font=\"impact\"][color=red]Manual Install:[/color][/font]
Extract the .zip file to the place of your choosing and copy to your data folder. 

[font=\"impact\"][color=red]Credits:[/color][/font] 
Wyldsong for the Noiral Race
Apachii for her Hair packs.
[b]They deserve all the credit for their hard work![/b]

[/center]
author: iYT
